location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to John Wedderburn, Civil Auditor, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmits his account disbursements for the Residency for the month of April. In addition, he provides a return of imported European goods and merchandise up to 30 April, a statement of pensions paid at Bushire and a list of establishments and allowances, with an estimate of exported receipts and disbursements for the ensuing year. These attachments are not included.
